revisions.rev:
{{infobox person |image= |caption=Cory English as [[Igor (Young Frankenstein)|Igor]] in ''[[Young Frankenstein (musical)|Young Frankenstein]]''. |birth_date=1968 |birth_place=[[Rochester, New York]] |occupation=[[Stage actor]] |spouse=[[Eva Alexander]] }} '''Cory English''' (born in 1968 in [[Rochester, New York]]), is an American actor.
Born into a blue collar family in [[upstate New York]], Cory was the youngest of four boys. Cory attended Wayne Central in [[Ontario, New York]]. He lived for several years in [[New York City]], where he was a [[Broadway theatre|Broadway]] gypsy, moving neatly from one musical to another.
In 1998 English studied classical theatre at the [[Drama Studio London]] in [[Ealing]]. He settled in England after marrying British actress [[Eva Alexander]]. For numerous years he taught Modern dance at the north London Theatre school sue nieto.<ref>{{cite web| url=http://www.theatre.com/story/id/3002386| author=theatre.com| title=Interview with Cory English| accessdate=2007-04-09 |archiveurl = http://web.archive.org/web/20070310192123/http://www.theatre.com/story/id/3002386 <!-- Bot retrieved archive --> |archivedate = 2007-03-10}}</ref>
West End credits include ''[[Chicago (musical)|Chicago]]'', and ''[[Guys and Dolls (musical)|Guys and Dolls]]''. Recently, he has been headlining the [[Mel Brooks]] smash ''[[The Producers (musical)|The Producers]]'' as Max Bialystock at [[Theatre Royal, Drury Lane]] and the UK National Tour.
More recently, English had a brief, uncredited appearance in the mockumentary talent show ''[[Peter Kay's Britain's Got the Pop Factor... and Possibly a New Celebrity Jesus Christ Soapstar Superstar Strictly on Ice]]'' aired on [[Channel 4]] in October 2008. English played a helium balloon inhaling singer auditionee, giving his rendition of [[Mika (singer)|Mika]]'s hit ''[[Grace Kelly (song)|Grace Kelly]]''. English and Kay had worked together previously (Kay playing flamboyant, gay director [[Roger De Bris]]) in the ''[[The Producers (musical)|The Producers]]'' at the [[Palace Theatre, Manchester]] in 2007.
Cory English worked on another theatre venture penned by [[Mel Brooks]] from late 2008, playing the part of [[Igor (Young Frankenstein)|Igor]] in a [[New York]] production of ''[[Young Frankenstein (musical)|Young Frankenstein]]'' replacing [[Christopher Fitzgerald (actor)|Christopher Fitzgerald]].<ref>[http://www.playbill.com/news/article/123523.html Hump Day: Cory English Is Young Frankenstein's New Igor, Starting Nov. 25]</ref> He is currently reprising the role in the United States national tour which also featured his former Broadway co-stars [[Roger Bart]] and [[Shuler Hensley]].<ref>[http://www.playbill.com/news/article/131563-Together_Again_Bart_and_Hensley_Will_Tour_in_Young_Frankenstein Together Again: Bart and Hensley Will Tour in Young Frankenstein]</ref>
